structure.unit: Nominations, Questions To Be Submitted To The Voters, Primaries And Caucuses

law.catch_line: Proceedings In Towns When Papers Not Filed
law.text: If, in a town, nomination papers placing persons in nomination for all the offices to be filled at a caucus are not filed, or upon a vacancy by death or otherwise, except a withdrawal, the chairman or secretary of the town committee shall forthwith call a meeting of said committee, which shall have all the powers relative to the nomination of candidates conferred in the preceding section upon a ward committee and the chairman and secretary of a city committee.
